issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

epic.name: Support Hyperloop modules
epic.summary: Support Hyperloop modules in Titanium Mobile

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
In order to make Hyperloop modules distributable (TIMOB-20379) on the marketplace / registry, we need to a) encrypt the source code and b) hook the module licensing into the build process.

I have no idea how that is done currently, but it looks like it's part of the upload process at the marketplace. Please feel free to discuss here!
fields.summary: Hyperloop: Encrypt module source for licensed deployment

comments.body: I am leading the development effort of a new encryption process (TIMOB-20351) that will make all of our wildest dreams come true. [~jhaynie], [~cng], and [~emerriman] have all raised their hands to be apart of this initiative in some capacity.
